attributes.action: Recognise that the political system is morally bankrupt. Fat cat MP's milking expenses, unrepresentative professional M.P’s of all political views and rigorous party politics have driven the average person to apathy. It’s time for change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: As explained in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions which call upon the PM to "recognise" or "acknowledge" something as they do not clearly call for a recognizable action. Read our terms and conditions here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
